module.description: Create a simple directed graphNEL graph object with four nodes and four edges

source.script: library(graph) nodes <- c("a", "b", "c", "d") edgeList <- list(a=list(edges=c("b")), b=list(edges=c("c")), c=list(edges=c("d")), d=list(edges=c("a"))) directedGraph <- new("graphNEL", nodes=nodes, edgeL=edgeList, edgemode="directed")
